TITLE: Episode 5 - Discrimination for All!
DESCRIPTION: Is the plight of the LGBT community our newest Civil Rights Movement? We’ll dicuss that as well as the Kentucky Supreme Court ruling on a company asked to create gay T-shirts and faith-based discrimination for LGBTQ parents.
